trigger: You are tagged in a photo
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you are tagged you in a new photo. NOTE: Facebook privacy settings may block IFTTTâ€™s access to some photos you are tagged in.
A Trigger that monitors changes in your Facebook profile information. It works with these Facebook profile fields: Name, Profile picture, Location, Website, and Bio.

trigger: New status message by you with hashtag
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you create a new plain text status message on Facebook with a specific hashtag.

trigger: New photo post by you in area
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you post a new public photo on Facebook at a location you specify.

trigger: Any new post by you in area
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you post on Facebook at a location you specify.
This Trigger fires every time you post a new photo on Facebook.
This Trigger fires every time you create a new link post on Facebook.
This Trigger fires every time you create a new plain text status message on Facebook.

trigger: New photo post by you with hashtag
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you post a new photo on Facebook with a specific hashtag.

trigger: New link post by you with hashtag
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you create a new link post on Facebook with a specific hashtag.
